content:
see Norcross, 1990). Let us consider some possible candidates in order of the
increasing number of individuals harmed: (1) The single harmed individual
might be the combination of the particular sperm and the particular egg that
would have united to form a zygote if contraception had not been used. (2) The
two harmed individuals might be the particular sperm itself, and, in addition,
the ovum itself that would have physically combined to form the zygote. (This
is modeled on the double homicide o
